title: Font Diner
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Font Diner**

Font Diner is a Wisconsin-based foundry specializing in [retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Retro) style and [display fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Display%20Fonts). [Stuart Sandler](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stuart%20Sandler) is the principal designer.

URL: [http://www.fontdiner.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204221056/http:/www.fontdiner.com/ "http://www.fontdiner.com/")
author: paul d hunt
